bike.description: Epic FSR M5 alloy, fully manipulated frame w/ ORE DT/TT, FACT carbon shock link, sealed cartridge bearings, 100mm travel, replaceable derailer hanger

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Flow Control valve, adjustable from HT firm to Trail Tune, air spring, adjustable rebound
Thomson, 7000 series aluminum, 2-bolt adjust, set back head, 30.9mm x 367/410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
